import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk add work to tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/work"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds work activity and updates progress fields for multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Use this to record time spent or progress updates across multiple tickets simultaneously.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → collect `TicketId` array
2. Bulk update: POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/work with ticket IDs and work details
3. Verify: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to confirm progress updates

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-activity) – Add activity to single ticket

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk working tickets (add activity and update progress fields).","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to update.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1},"Request":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Work-progress payload used by bulk work operations to add an activity and optionally set status/close metadata.","properties":{"Activity":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Represents an activity or comment on a ticket.","properties":{"TicketActivityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the activity."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier.","nullable":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was last modified."},"IsPublic":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity is visible to end users."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity has been soft-deleted."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the ticket. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets), extract `Items[].TicketId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"TicketSubject":{"type":"string","description":"Subject of the parent ticket.","nullable":true},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who created the activity.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"OwnerDetails":{"type":"string","description":"Quick reference display name for the owner.","nullable":true},"ActivityItems":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of polymorphic items making up the activity content.","items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"description":"Polymorphic activity item. Fields vary by activity type."},"nullable":true},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Sort order index."},"Alignment":{"type":"string","description":"UI alignment preference.","nullable":true}},"title":"TicketActivity"}],"type":"object","description":"Activity/comment details to attach to each ticket."},"StatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional workflow status type identifier to apply.","nullable":true},"CloseReasonTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional close reason type identifier to apply when closing.","nullable":true},"IsIssueConfirmed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to mark the ticket issue as confirmed.","default":false}},"title":"SetTicketProgressRequest"}],"type":"object","description":"Work/progress payload applied to each ticket."}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"title":"BulkWorkTicketsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
